title: Product Review Proposal
content:
Hello sir,
I am a youtuber and try to do new something in 2020. So, I want to make some unboxing video. I requested you to give  me a product for review. I have more than 1000 active friend on Facebook.
I will be waiting for your reply.
        Thanking you
